title: I want an explanation
body: Recently [this thing ](http://skins.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/gameover/)came to my attention.  I'm super hyped, but also very confused.

replies.body: Theorycrafting, go! :D

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-9-Mn5MRztpY/UgOgGPdOlnI/AAAAAAAACUE/Y7-oNBKjE4Y/s1600/claw.jpg

The claw!

It's a metaphor for our experiences in League of Legends; we click 'Yes' to continue playing, but we lose the game anyways, despite our efforts. And then Blitz laughs at us

(◕‿◕✿)
Sad but true
Glitchcrank

http://imgur.com/uzM7LB1
Mini-boss {{champion:53}}
so many upvotes for doukutsu

THEORYCRAFTING- GOING(!):

**A few notes:**


- I'm bad at this game (not much of a theory crafting point but I thought that I should write that down for some reason).


- Previously, we've only got these kind of skin teasers* for Legendary and Ultimate skins, if I'm not mistaken.

(*Note: teasers, not promos like for DS Braum and Panth that happened only after they were released on the PBE.)


- From the laugh and electricity effect, it seems like Blitzcrank.


- Final Boss Veigar is the one that announces the player's uncontrollable defeat.

-_-


- NOW, why would **Blitzcrank** laugh on the player's defeat? Is he siding with the Tiny, Evil Master of the Arcade? Is this the Final Boss, BLITZCRANK?
secret boss blitzcrank
DLC fanservice blitzcrank?
plot twist: it's mordekaiser, who corrupted all of everybody.
Miniboss Blitzcrank

It's obviously Arcade Teemo.
The little circle thing with the exclamation mark represent his shrooms.  {{champion:17}}
OK, I'm just gonna guess. There will be Arcade related skins for: Definitely Blitz, maybe Riven, probably Arcade Ao Shin too?

I gave my quarter just to lose? WHAT TYPE OF GAME IS THAT?!!?! T-T all i ever did was try to beat the last level
c'mon Riot :(

Final boss... dunno who as I can't place the voice (playing while listening to songs gogogo).  

Imma guess final boss shaco.
That's Final Boss Veigar's voice.
Game over screens can't melt steel beams.
What about Lissandra ARCADE RITO ?

It could be a blitz skin along the same lines as veigar's and final boss is an opposing line to Arcade, like marauders vs wardens. which would make sense since the color scheme for arcade is so much different than final boss
Ok. What's going on because Bilgewater is still happening somewhere.

\>Final Boss Veiger voice, and theme. 
\>Baron Nashor's head, although probably just for show.
\>Only other voice is Blitzcrank's laugh.
\>Bolts of purple electricity. 
\>"Playtime has ended", followed by End-Game music. 

Mini-Boss Blitzcrank confirmed.

EDIT: Wa-BAM called it. It was Battle Boss, but I was close enough, still a subordinate to Final Boss Veigar ;)

> [{quoted}](name=SquishyTentacles,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Ep2hAEBw,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-03T23:20:20.035+0000)
>
> \>Final Boss Veiger voice, and theme. 
> \>Baron Nashor's head, although probably just for show.
> \>Only other voice is Blitzcrank's laugh.
> \>Bolts of purple electricity. 
> \>"Playtime has ended", followed by End-Game music. 
> 
> Mini-Boss Blitzcrank confirmed.

God no please..the Blitzcrank spam...

Baron Nashor's head, although probably just for show 
It's a summoner icon.

> [{quoted}](name=BTLmovies,realm=EUW,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Ep2hAEBw,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-08-03T23:32:25.834+0000)
>
> Baron Nashor's head, although probably just for show 
> It's a summoner icon.

But it says skins in the url.
I mean the baron nashor head is a summoner icon.  You can buy it in the shop

Very interesting...

Personally I don't think it's a Blitzcrank arcade skin.  Something else is going on here.  My guess is that Blitz is behind the game that the arcade skins are based on.

So the question to me isn't whether or not Blitz is getting a new skin, but if Blitz was in charge of a game which champion would he put in it next?

EDIT:  With all this said, I could see a Game Master Blitzcrank skin as well.
Arcade Blitzcrank would be pretty cool, I think. Even if I couldn't deal with an influx of Blitz players.

Well, we have a Fighter, Mage, Support, and Marksman... Now all that's left is a Tank and/or Assassin. 

In our Tanks, there are:

{{champion:12}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:154}} 

and {{champion:53}} is first on my list of possible tanks, but {{champion:3}} comes in second (just think how cool it'd be)

as for assassins:

{{champion:84}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:91}} and {{champion:238}} 

you can decide from these to be the most likely contenders. That's just how I see it. It can still be any champ as I have a 50|50 change of being right.

{{champion:27}} is the obvious Arcade skin, I mean it would be so cool...

Plus since I'm a {{champion:107}} main and I need a new skin so pls rito rengo.

For some reason i can't hear the audio but blitz wouldn't really make sense because we already have an arcade support. Sona, hecarim, mf, and veigar leave the last spot for an arcade team to a toplaner. The icon definitely throws me off since it looks almost like the circle on blitz's chest.

That ! icon is even called "chest" in the page's source code. It's probably blitz. 
Sona is jungle obviously. Hec top.

Don't forget that Viktor also has a circle on his chest and created Blitz, plus skin teasers have never been that obvious. Furthermore, in the teaser there's a sustained lightning field, just like Viktor's ult (Blitz's ult is instant) AND in his Creator skin the circle in his chest comes out to create the storm, like in the teaser. 
Also, Blitz has more skins than Viktor and people have requested Arcade Viktor ever since Arcade Sona, so it's only fair. And finally, on top of that Viktor has had a HUGE rise in popularity (it has increased more than 1500%) and Riot tend to give skins to popular champions.
I'm prepared to be disappointed with a Blitz skin, but I'm really hoping for a Viktor skin.
Riot doesn't limit sets to 5 skins or to making a full team comp, they make skins for champs that could fit well into a thematic.
http://upload2.inven.co.kr/upload/2015/08/04/bbs/i12256379818.png
I just know if Blitz gets yet ANOTHER skin when there are more deserving champs? I'll be very pissed.

Arcade {{champion:92}} 
Battle Boss {{champion:53}}

Ok, So instead of theory crafting how about we look into PBE stuff? 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ZHuFtIBqJQ  <--- Skin #1
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JuCQRw86Vhk <---- Skin #2 For you top laners :)

another arcade skin, perhaps {{champion:53}} ?

on a side note, get Utora in here to accept my appreciation for dem ear-hole bliss-like musicas!
So we have an arcade supp, mid, adc, jung......I was hoping a top laner would get the skin, but no doubt is a blitz skin.
Better nerf Irelia.
I think its a {{champion:85}} skin with the electric in the beginning
New Flask, duh.
howd you find it?

I assume the blackened numbers are some sort of code in binary? Maybe someone can match them frame by frame and get a message?

Aside from that, I guess a new set of Arcade skins?
It changes frame per frame, so you either have to match it through translation (moving on the physical plane) or there isn't any message.
Anyone know what the 1s and 0s say?
Surrender at 20 said they'd show us on Tuesday. It's likely another Final Boss skin for {{champion:53}}
